name: Pizza Check
description:
Pizza Check

Submission for Godot Wild Jam #31.

You just ordered your favorite pizza with tomatoes, mozzarella, chili, olives, mushrooms, corn, broccoli and of course oregano. But something is missing. Quickly check the ingredients before your pizza is spoiled.

One player mode: check as many plates as possible within one minute.

Two player mode: be faster than your opponent to check 10 plates. This works only on a tablet where you put the tablet between both players and use touch to push the buttons. Or you need a second mouse ;-)

The game is designed for Android tablets.

Source Code: https://github.com/kaiec/pizzacheck
